title: Workers hired, wage rate on monopsony graph

content.question: In the monopsonistic labor market shown in the diagram above, which of the following indicates the number of workers the firm will hire and the wage rate it will pay?

choices.label:
Number of Workers: L1
Wage Rate: W1

Number of Workers: L1
Wage Rate: W2

Number of Workers: L1
Wage Rate: W3

Number of Workers: L2
Wage Rate: W2

Number of Workers: L2
Wage Rate: W4

content.answer:
Number of Workers: L1
Wage Rate: W1

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
